content: You are Lorenzo. Regarding your successfully completed an action 'wage_payment' involving Giacomo., Giacomo just said to you: '"Ah, thanks, Lorenzo! Appreciate that. Felt a little lighter just now, honestly."' What is your brief, natural reply?
"You're most welcome, Giacomo. Glad to hear it made a difference."

You are Lorenzo. Regarding your successfully completed an action 'wage_payment' involving Giacomo., Giacomo just said to you: '"Ah, thanks, Lorenzo! Much appreciated. Feels good to get that sorted."' What is your brief, natural reply?
"Prego, Giacomo! Glad to have it sorted for you. Enjoy your day!"
